data.quote: You are not a problem! you are a learning opportunity
data.author: Taliyah, League of Legends

data.quote: A cold heart sometimes just needs a warm smile.
data.author: Braum, League of Legends

data.quote: A stone can't be polished without a little friction.
data.author: Taliyah, League of Legends

data.quote: You have survived every single bad day so far
data.author: Taliyah, League of Legends

data.quote: I don't give up until I get it right
data.author: Ekko, League of Legends

data.quote: Dedication Overcomes Lack of Talent
data.author: Rock Lee

data.quote: I'd rather make mistakes than do nothing
data.author: Ekko, League of Legends

data.quote: I am right
data.author: Naruto

data.quote: Failure does not give you a reason to give up as long as you believe
data.author: Naruto

data.quote: If you do not like your destination, do not accept. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be
data.author: Naruto

data.quote: If you smile you can also brighten
data.author: Lux,League of Legends

data.quote: Our failures are sometimes more fruitful than successes
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: It is the custom of a fool, when he errs, to complain about others. It is the custom of a wise man to complain about himself
data.author: SÃ³crates

data.quote: Experience is the name each one gives to their mistakes.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: Talent wins games, but only teamwork wins championships.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity
data.author: Elmer Letterman

data.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
data.author: Vidal Sasson

data.quote: Celebrate your successes. See your failures in humor
data.author: Sam Walton

data.quote: Confidence in yourself is the first secret of success.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Dreams are to be realized, so don't look back or listen to words of desire
data.author: Unknow
